quests.name: Befriend the Moonlit Faeries
quests.description: Forge a bond with the ethereal 'Moonlit Faeries' residing in the Moonlit Glade. Gain their trust by assisting them in warding off threats from encroaching darkness. Explore the serene glade, protect it from 'Nocturnal Stags,' and learn the ancient faerie rituals.

quests.name: Protect the Glade from Darkness
quests.description: Defend the Moonlit Glade from the encroaching forces of darkness that seek to extinguish its serene beauty. Battle 'Shadowling Terrors' and 'Nightshade Beasts' while uncovering the source of this malevolence.

quests.name: Retrieve the Moonstone Amulet
quests.description: Embark on a side quest to retrieve the stolen 'Moonstone Amulet,' a powerful artifact of the Moonlit Glade. Track down the cunning 'Moonlight Thieves' who took it and navigate the glade's enchanting yet perilous terrain.

quests.name: Awaken the Guardians of Light
quests.description: Discover the 'Guardians of Light,' ancient protectors of the Moonlit Glade who have slumbered for centuries. To awaken them, gather 'Lunar Essences' from the glade's flora and offer them at the 'Shrine of Illumination.'

quests.name: Restore the Balance of Day and Night
quests.description: Help restore the delicate balance between day and night within the Moonlit Glade. Seek out the 'Twilight Wisps' that hold the power to influence this balance and protect them from harm.
